snippet: Football at Steubenville High School is an everyday topic. But rape charges against two players have some residents questioning the culture of football in the Ohio community.
abstract: Rape case involving Steubenville High School football players Trent Mays and Ma'lik Richmond, which unfolded on the Internet, has some residents questioning the culture of football in the Ohio community; case is not the first time a high school football team has been entangled in accusations of sexual assault, but situation in Steubenville is separated from others since it was caught on camera and posted on Web.

byline.original: By JULIET MACUR and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: Football at Steubenville High School is an everyday topic. But rape charges against two players have some residents questioning the culture of football in the Ohio community.

headline.seo: Rape Case Unfolds Online and Divides Steubenville
headline.main: Rape Case Unfolds on Web and Splits City
headline.print_headline: Rape Case Unfolds On Web and Splits City
